name: Black Edition Petit Corona
additionalNotes:
Don Ursulo is a 100% Nicaraguan cigar.
Hand made in Costa Rica. The filler consists of Cuban seed tobaccos, while a Havanna 2000 is used for the binder and wrapper. The cigars are offered in 6 sizes: Petit Corona, Corona, Robusto, Churchill, Perfecto and Toro.
